choice.title: miniAudicle
choice.description: miniAudicle is an integrated development environment specifically tailored to the ChucK programming language. Installing miniAudicle is strongly recommended.

choice.title: chuck
choice.description: chuck is the command line-based compiler and runtime of the ChucK programming language.

choice.title: ChuGins
choice.description: ChuGins extend the native capabilities of ChucK with additional unit generators.

choice.title: ABSaturator
choice.description: Soft clip saturating distortion, based on examples from Abel/Berners' Music 424 course at Stanford.

choice.title: AmbPan
choice.description: Panning UGens for encoding panned signals into the Ambisonics B-format.

choice.title: Bitcrusher
choice.description: Sample-width reducer + sample rate decimator, bringing to mind the sounds of your favorite low-fidelity vintage audio equipment

choice.title: Elliptic
choice.description: Elliptic filter, capable of very steep slopes or interesting harmonic ripples. By Joel Matthys.

choice.title: FIR
choice.description: Arbitrary order FIR filter. By Perry Cook.

choice.title: GVerb
choice.description: Good quality stereo reverb with adjustable parameters. By Joel Matthys.

choice.title: KasFilter
choice.description: Undersampling-based resonant lowpass filter. By Kassen.

choice.title: Mesh2D
choice.description: STK instrument that simulates a rectilinear, 2-dimensional digital waveguide mesh structure. Basically sounds like striking a metal plate. By Joel Matthys.

choice.title: PanN
choice.description: Basic equal-power panners for 4, 8, and 16 channels.

choice.title: PitchTrack
choice.description: Monophonic autocorrelation pitch tracker, based on [helmholtz~] by Katja, http://www.katjaas.nl/helmholtz/helmholtz.html. By Joel Matthys.

choice.title: Spectacle
choice.description: FFT-based spectral delay and EQ. By Joel Matthys.
